meanings.definition: A type of fish that resembles a pipe in shape.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium had colorful pipefishes swimming gracefully.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of pipefishes gliding through the water.
meanings.sent3: The pipefishes decided to have a race to see who could swim the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The pipefishes in the tank looked like living tubes of art.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the long, slender pipefishes.

meanings.sent1: The diver spotted many pipefishes hiding among the coral.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the behavior of pipefishes in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The pipefishes gathered for a meeting to discuss ocean matters.
meanings.sent4: The aquarium exhibit showcased a variety of pipefishes from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The pipefishes swam in unison, creating a mesmerizing sight.
